awards:
第76届洛迦诺国际电影节(2023)
　　明日之豹奖 国际竞赛(提名) 金·托雷斯

　　第38届马德普拉塔电影节(2023)
　　拉丁美洲竞赛单元 最佳短片奖(提名) 金·托雷斯

　　第5届海南岛国际电影节(2023)
　　金椰奖 最佳短片奖(提名) 金·托雷斯
introduction: When a magical moon is drawn in the twilight, different timelines interweave in the town of Manzanillo, located in the Caribbean coast of Costa Rica. The gazes of the young and those of adults come together and clash in a tale in which the town is capable of existing just as it is—at once beautiful and forgotten, mysterious and monotonous. As in a dream or a memory, mixing documentary style with science fiction, this story is a search for the complexities of what it means to grow up in a place like Manzanillo.源自：https://www.mardelplatafilmfest.com/38/en/pelicula/solo-la-luna-comprendera
